DOC.brief_summary: This study is a registry of general use of Avance Nerve Graft and is intended to evaluate the uses, response rates, and safety of Avance Nerve Graft in the real life clinical setting.
DOC.brief_title: Registry of Avance Nerve Graft Evaluating Utilization and Outcomes for the Reconstruction of Peripheral Nerve Discontinuities
DOC.criteria: Adult patients treated with Avance Nerve Graft Subjects who do not provide informed consent or decline participation.
